title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.803 - Emergency lists of operator personnel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.803 - Emergency lists of operator personnel

State Regulations

Each operator shall submit a list during January of each
year indicating the names, addresses, and home and business telephone numbers
of responsible officials who may be contacted in the event of an emergency. The
list shall also be submitted to all municipalities within which the operator's
facilities are located. In the event of any changes in the list within the
year, immediate notification shall be given to all
recipients. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.803

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
